mapper.sql: id, activity_id, user_id, content, parent_id, like_count, is_deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_activity_comment (activity_id, user_id, content, parent_id, like_count, is_deleted, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{activityId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{parentId}, #{likeCount}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_activity_comment WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT c.id, c.activity_id, c.user_id, c.content, c.parent_id, c.like_count, c.create_time, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_activity_comment child WHERE child.parent_id = c.id AND child.is_deleted = 0 ) AS child_count FROM t_activity_comment c WHERE c.id = #{id} AND c.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT c.id, c.activity_id, c.user_id, c.content, c.parent_id, c.like_count, c.create_time, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_activity_comment child WHERE child.parent_id = c.id AND child.is_deleted = 0 ) AS child_count FROM t_activity_comment c WHERE c.is_deleted = 0 AND c.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY c.create_time ASC
SELECT id FROM t_activity_comment WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND is_deleted = 0
